channel.title: My Paint Guitar
channel.description:
Well, I was really bored and decided to watch a video of this guy who did a really neat image in Paint. It motivated me, and so I made a guitar. The tuning part of it came out wrong, and I was kinda too lazy to really fix it. Overall, it took be about 2 hours just to get this... [img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/3228/guitartnz0.png[/img]
Then I colored in Paint, and I didn't upload. So, I colored it in PhotoShop: [img]http://img111.imageshack.us/img111/1345/finalguitarfg4.png[/img]
Personally, I like the outline better than the colored one. Tell me what you think ;)
~Lin

item.title: My Paint Guitar
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

And, I’ll say again. PhotoShop has a pencil tool.

Read full topic

item.title: My Paint Guitar
item.dc:creator: @brownsymcard brownsymcard
item.description:
@brownsymcard wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

Who cares what program you use to make Pixel Art. For one thing PhotoShop has a pencil tool. Second, it’s still a piece of art. No matter what program is used. It may look terrible, but it’s still art.

Firstly, it doesn’t look like crap. Your right, it doesn’t matter what someone uses to make something. However, for pixel art it does.
The definition is of pixel art from wikipedia:
Pixel art is distinguished from other forms of digital art by an insistence upon manual, pixel-level editing of an image (without the application of image filters, automatic anti-aliasing [<<<This part is key, even vista’s paint (puts aa on everything) makes pixel art impossible on it] or special rendering modes).

Read full topic

item.title: My Paint Guitar
item.dc:creator: @Frostie21 Frostie21
item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

[quote=“brownsymcard, post:9, topic:204708”][quote author=frost21 link=topic=270239.msg2223024#msg2223024 date=1210655589]

The linework looks like paint, however, the coloring is not paint.

Thanks for that Captain Obvious.Topic creator clearly states what you just wrote.
[/quote]

Sorry I dont always have time to read every word said on this forum, as it is normally BS. Im just used to having to debunk “pixel art” when people color it on a different program and say its paint. The poster did say it was photoshop, I merely missed it.[/quote]

I am sorry,I understand where your coming from.

Read full topic
